title: Alchemilla
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Raw, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery
description: A 100% biological vegetarian/vegan laboratory kitchen/pastry shop with retail takeaway lunches, cakes, pies and many other things. All raw materials are organic and local when possible. Serves multi-ethnic cuisine. Offers a full range of dishes based on cereals naturally gluten free, as well as for every day a raw food dish. Specializes in lunch boxes delivered to your place or you can pick up. Many other deli preparations can be found in the shop.
